entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 4:27AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Snow continues Monday into Wednesday for the Interior... A strong frontal boundary is bringing snow and blowing snow over the northern Interior today. Gusty northeast winds of 25 to 40 mph will reduce visibility over higher terrain north of Fairbanks and along the Elliott, Steese and Dalton highways. The second shot of snow brings a better chance of accumulating snow
